data.caption: Clarification sought from Reliance Infrastructure Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Reliance Infrastructure Ltd on June 04 2025 with reference to news appeared in www.businesstoday.in dated June 04 2025 quoting "Reliance Infra becomes first private Indian firm to develop next-gen 155mm artillery shells"

The reply is awaited.
